lines:
Gael Gie: Hail, young adventurer!
I am Gael Gie, a helpful golden chanterelle!
Fungus McShroom: Guile! We've met before! Can't you remember?

Gael Gie: Uh, sure!
I'm sure we've met when I wasn't lost in a cave!
Gael Gie: Did I mention being lost in a cave?
Fungus McShroom: Haven't you tried escaping?

Gael Gie: Why would I?
There's a puddle of strawberry milk here!
Fungus McShroom: Strawberry milk... my favorite!
Gael Gie: Favorite? What are you, an animal?
Fungus McShroom: I'm not so sure myself.
Fungus McShroom: Anyway, you're free to go now!
Gael Gie: Why would I? I have spells to teach you!
Fungus McShroom: Why would you do that?
Fungus McShroom: ...
Fungus McShroom: Scratch that. Hit me up!

options.text: I want my ranged spells to cause more damage!

lines: Fungus McShroom: I want my ranged spells to cause more damage!

Gael Gie: Good, but be sure you use that with either
Mycelium Missile or Spore Spread.

Gael Gie: It'd be a waste to take this
if you didn't have at least one of these spells.
Fungus McShroom: I understand the risks.
Fungus McShroom: I want better armor!
Gael Gie: Excellent choice... if you get hit often.
Fungus McShroom: What's that supposed to mean?

Gael Gie: Oh, nothing.
It just seems like something that only
someone who gets hit often would choose.
Fungus McShroom: You talk a lot of smack for an NPC that cannot retaliate.
Gael Gie: Anyway, what can I do for you, Fungus?

options.text: How did you get lost here?
How do you know my name?

lines: Fungus McShroom: How did you get lost here?

Gael Gie: How did I get lost here?
HOW DID I GET LOST HERE?
Gael Gie: ...

Gael Gie: I don't really know.
I only remember a really funky trip
through some tunnels and whoosh! Here I am.
Fungus McShroom: "Funky" trip?
Gael Gie: Good thing I didn't eat those mushrooms!
Fungus McShroom: How do you know my name?

Gael Gie: What do you mean, "name"?
You are a fungus, aren't you?

Fungus McShroom: Do you mean I look like a fungus,
or like a Fungus kind of guy?
Gael Gie: You look like a fun-
Fungus McShroom: DON'T.
Fungus McShroom: Where are we?

Gael Gie: This is the chocolate cave,
southwest of Lake Milkshake.
Fungus McShroom: Don't you mean Strawberry Milk Lake?
Gael Gie: Uh, yeah. I'm a little lost, you see.
Fungus McShroom: Yet you know where we are...?
Fungus McShroom: Shouldn't that be "Gaël"?
Gael Gie: I don't hear any difference.
Fungus McShroom: I didn't hear any difference to "Guile Guy".
Gael Gie: What? Those are completely different names!

Gael Gie: Can't you read?
What are you, some kind of plant?
